data: {"generalSituation":"The northeast monsoon will continue to affect southern China in the next couple of days. Meanwhile, a broad band of clouds will bring a few rain patches to the northern part of the South China Sea. The monsoon is expected to be replaced by a fresh to strong easterly airstream later on Tuesday. It will be windy over the coast of Guangdong in the following couple of days. A replenishment of the monsoon will affect southern China over the weekend. Besides, the broad area of low pressure near the Philippines will move across the southern part of the South China Sea in the next couple of days, towards Vietnam.","weatherForecast":[{"forecastDate":"20251027","week":"Monday","forecastWind":"North to northeast force 4, occasionally force 5.","forecastWeather":"Mainly cloudy. Sunny intervals during the day.
